short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pulls your fantasy football league information from various sources to sync with DraftSharks.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will allow you to bring your roster and league info into draftsharks.com. No need to share your passwords with us. As long as you have logged-in to your favorite commissioning site recently enough, we can use your cookies or pull league data from the site directly.
